anya-e0810n0:803_0: Dvayaṃ makuṭe. Kira vikiraṇe, īṭo. Maki maṇḍane, uṭo. Mukuṭotipi pāṭho, ete dve anitthī.
anya-e0810n0:808_0: Dvayaṃ muttāvaliyaṃ. Harīyate mano yena hāro. Muttānaṃ āvali panti muttāvali. Hārāsaddopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:809_1: Pakoṭṭho nāma kapparassādhobhāgo. Nī naye, uro, iyādeso.
anya-e0810n0:809_4: Pari samantato harati cittaṃ yanti parihārakaṃ, ṇvu.
anya-e0810n0:815_0: Rasanā soḷasā ñeyyā, kalāpā pañcavīsati kalāpo pañcavīsako (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 16.108).
anya-e0810n0:816_1: Pagaṇḍo nāma kapparassoparibhāgo. Ke sadde, uro, yāgamo.
anya-e0810n0:817_7: Pādakaṭako ca nūpuro ceti kaṭakasaddassa pulliṅgepi pavattanato dvandasamāso. Tulākoṭi,
anya-e0810n0:818_8: Ettha ca mukhaphulluṇṇatānaṃ visesaṃ vipariyayenāpīti vadanti.
anya-e0810n0:820_16: “khoma’maṭṭe dukūlecā”ti nānatthasaṅgahatikaṇḍasesesu nānatthasaṅgaha 3.3.295 vuttattā na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:820_26: raṅkunāmakassa hariṇavisesassa lomenasañjātavatthaṃ rāṅkavaṃ vigaromajaṃ (amara 16.111), alo,
anya-e0810n0:820_35: Migalomāni koṭṭetvā sukhumāni katvā katamambaraṃ koṭumbaraṃ,
anya-e0810n0:820_38: Bhaṅgaṃ nāma khomādīni sabbāni ekajjhāni vomissetvā katavatthaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:821_6: Bāhulyena antare majjhe bhavaṃ antarīyaṃ, īyo.
anya-e0810n0:826_2: Nāḷipatto taṃsaṇṭhāno suvaṇṇādipaṭo nāḷipatto. Sīsakaṃ, siriyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:827_3: Ā bhuso yāti gacchatīti vā āyāmo,
anya-e0810n0:830_2: Cīvarapariyantoyaṃ mahāpathaviyā cakkavāḷapabbato viya cīvarassa samantato tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0810n0:830_4: so hi visuṃ visuṃ vaṭṭatīti vivaṭṭoti vuccati,
anya-e0810n0:831_2: etā vatthassa yoniyo kāraṇāni tato taduppattito.
anya-e0810n0:831_8: Khomādayo pana paṭā tacabbhavā tacato sañjātā.
anya-e0810n0:837_3: go viya jalaṃ viya sītanti vā gosītaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:838_10: amarakose pana “gosīsādīni rattacandanantāni visese vattantī”ti amara 16.131 vuttāni.
anya-e0810n0:838_17: Tilapaṇṇīpattaṅgāni rattacandanasadisassa rattasārassa ekassa candanassa nāmāni.
anya-e0810n0:839_1: Atha vā tilapaṇyādīni cattāri lohitacandanasadisassa rattasārassa ekassa candanavisesassa nāmāni.
anya-e0810n0:842_0: Asmiṃ agarumhi kāḷe sati “kāḷāgarū”tyuccate. Mallikāpupphagandhi agaru pana maṅgalyoccate.
anya-e0810n0:843_0: Dvayaṃ sallakīdave. Turukkho vutto. Piḍi saṅghāte, ṇvu. Sihalo, yāvaṇopyatra.
anya-e0810n0:845_4: Attano chāyūpagate aje pāletīti ajapālakaṃ, ṇvu.
anya-e0810n0:848_6: sajjassa raso davo sajjulaso, assu, lattañca.
anya-e0810n0:851_1: ā bhuso rattaṃ karotīti alattako, lattaṃ, kvi.
anya-e0810n0:852_3: Saralanāmakassa rukkhassa davo raso saraladdavo. Pāyaso,
anya-e0810n0:855_7: Amarakose pana “mālāmālyāni muddhani pavattāya mālāya nāmānī”ti amara 16.135 vadati.
anya-e0810n0:855_14: vasa nivāse, kamme to, tīsu, yathā –
anya-e0810n0:856_15: anekatthattā upasagganipātānaṃ uddhaṃbhāvajotako cettha avasaddoti tathottaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:857_3: Ubhayatrapi adhikaraṇe yu, isse, e aya,
anya-e0810n0:859_6: aṭa gamanattho, ani, yu vā, nadādi, rasso.
anya-e0810n0:860_1: Kuḷīrapādādayo ime cattāro mañcantarā mañcabhedā siyuṃ.
anya-e0810n0:860_2: Tattha kuḷīro kakkaṭako tassa saṇṭhānapādattā kuḷīrapādo.
anya-e0810n0:860_4: āhacca vā pādo tiṭṭhati yassāti āhaccapādo,
anya-e0810n0:860_13: Bundena pādena saha ekābaddhā aṭani yassa so bundikābaddho,
anya-e0810n0:860_15: Ettha ca majjhe dvinnaṃ mañcānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vipariyayenāpi vadanti.
anya-e0810n0:861_2: Visesena sīsaṃ vahatīti bibbohanaṃ, yu, battaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:862_2: Yadādinā ke paccaye itthikatākāre pare pubbo akāro ikāramāpajjate,
anya-e0810n0:864_5: Dīghena lomena yutto āsanappabhedo “gonako”ti mato, gu sadde, yu,
anya-e0810n0:868_2: uditaṃ dvīsu lomaṃ dasā yassā sā uddalomī, issattaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:868_5: ekasmiṃ ante pariyante lomaṃ dasā yassātthīti ekantalomī,
anya-e0810n0:868_8: na samāsantaragesū”ti vuttepi gāthābhāvato chandohānibhayā visandhi.
anya-e0810n0:869_1: Tadeva yathāvuttadvayameva soḷasannaṃ itthīnaṃ naccayoggaṃ naccassa yogyaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ “kuttaka”mityuccate.
anya-e0810n0:870_7: Yatra hi pakatiyā vā vikatiyā vāti dvinnampi vuttatā siyā,
anya-e0810n0:870_12: tadā attanā vattabbassa aññatthassābhāvā vikatipyuccate vācakena, yathā –
anya-e0810n0:870_14: idha pana liṅgabhedeneva vuttaṃ “cittaṃ vikatikā bhave”ti.
anya-e0810n0:871_10: Ettha ca cakāro pādantattā garūsu gaṇhitabbo,
anya-e0810n0:875_3: Vaṇṭaṃ nāma bījanādikaraṇatthaṃ visuṃ bhājito tālapattāvayavo,
anya-e0810n0:875_4: tālavaṇṭasaddassa yathāvuttavacanatthayogepi sati saññāsaddattā bījanīsāmaññe pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0810n0:875_6: tadā ekena tālasaddena visesetvā “tālatālavaṇṭa”nti vattabbaṃ. Yathā –
anya-e0810n0:877_9: atha vā vigato ayo vuḍḍhi tasmāti avāyo,
anya-e0810n0:878_4: Aññamaññassa pāṇino gahaṇaṃ pāṇiggaho. Nī naye, a. Ubbāho,
anya-e0810n0:879_6: Tulyabalehi pana dhammādīhi catūhi padhānehi catubhadra amara 17.57 muccate.
anya-e0810n0:880_0: 319-320. Dvayaṃ khujje. Kucchitaṃ vajjatīti khujjo, kassa kho, valopo, ṇo. Gaḍi nindāyaṃ, ulo.
anya-e0810n0:881_6: laku viya ghaṭikā viya ḍeti pavattetīti vā lakuṇḍako.
anya-e0810n0:882_7: yathā hi rathassa akkhe bhinne gamanaṃ na sijjhati,
anya-e0810n0:883_0: Dvayaṃ khañje. Khaji gativekalye, bhūvādi, khañjatīti, a. Khoḍi gatipaṭighāte, ko.
anya-e0810n0:884_0: Dvayaṃ avākye. Vattumasakkuṇeyyattā migasadisoti mūgo, issū. Suññaṃ vaco yassāti so suññavaco.
anya-e0810n0:886_5: nikkesattā khaṃ tucchaṃ sīsaṃ lātīti khallāṭo, ṭo.
anya-e0810n0:888_0: Akkhīnaṃ majjhe ekenākkhinā suñño kāṇo nāma,
anya-e0810n0:889_3: Suti kaṇṇo hīno vikalo yassāti sutihīno.
anya-e0810n0:890_5: kattari vā uro, āturo, dīghādi. Āmayāvī, vikato, apaṭu,
anya-e0810n0:891_4: Khujjādayo ummattantā vāccaliṅge yuttatāya vāccaliṅgikā, yathā –
anya-e0810n0:892_3: ā bhuso taṅkatīti ātaṅko, a. Ama roge, yo,
anya-e0810n0:892_13: vividhā vā ādhayo manopīḷā yasmiṃsa byādhi,
anya-e0810n0:892_14: “pume ādhi mānasī byathā”ti amara 8.28 hi amarakose vuttaṃ. Rogegado,
anya-e0810n0:894_3: Upasaggato nāsāya bahubbīhimhi nasādesaṃ kubbanti pāṇini 5.4.119,
anya-e0810n0:905_0: Iha tvabhedenottaṃ. Patipubbo sidhātu rujatyattho. Nāsikāya jāto rogo nāsikārogo.
anya-e0810n0:906_9: Vaṇa gattavicuṇṇane, curādi, a, vaṇo, anitthī.
anya-e0810n0:906_13: “itthiyamato āpaccayo”ti ā, pīḷako, pīḷakā, pīḷakaṃ, tīsvapi,
anya-e0810n0:908_1: Rattassa lohitassa saṇṭhānamatikkamitvā saraṇaṃ gamanaṃ rattātisāro.
anya-e0810n0:909_2: apagato sāro yena apamāro, sassa mo.
anya-e0810n0:909_10: vidārīyamānattā vipajjamāno pādo assanti vā vipādikā.
anya-e0810n0:911_8: Yumhi kaṇḍūvanaṃ, assū. Uvādeso, dīgho ca.
anya-e0810n0:913_1: Amaṅgalatāya du ninditaṃ nāmamassa dunnāmaṃ, sakatthe,
anya-e0810n0:913_4: Ari viya sasati hiṃ satīti arisaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:914_6: Tilaṃ viya kāḷo hutvā jāyatīti tilakāḷako.
anya-e0810n0:915_5: visesena sūci viya vijjhatīti vā visūcikā.
anya-e0810n0:916_25: Sūla rujāyaṃ, bhūvādi, sūlaṃ. Viddadhi, asmarī,
anya-e0810n0:917_6: Bhisajjati cikicchatīti bhisakko, a, jassa ko.
anya-e0810n0:918_3: Yathāvuttaṃ sallaṃ nīharaṇavasena kantati chindatīti sallakatto,
anya-e0810n0:920_2: Anatthakārakattā kucchitākārena sarīre sentīti kusā, rogā,
anya-e0810n0:926_0: Khattiyādayo khattiyabrāhmaṇavessasuddā cattāro vaṇṇā kulāni bhavanti,
anya-e0810n0:926_1: ete hi aññamaññamasaṅkarato vaṇṇetabbato ṭhapetabbato vaṇṇāti vuccante.
anya-e0810n0:928_6: Pathaviyā issaro patthivo, ṇo, dvittaṃ, ittañca.
anya-e0810n0:929_13: Rajjāropanasamaye dakkhiṇāvaṭṭasaṅkhodakena gaṅgānītena muddhani khattiyakaññādīhi abhisittattā muddhābhisitto,
anya-e0810n0:929_15: Tappabhavatāya pana anabhisittā ca muddhābhisittākhyā, yathā –
anya-e0810n0:929_17: Brahmabāhuto jātattā bāhujoti hi nikāyantarikānaṃ laddhi.
anya-e0810n0:929_18: Yasmiṃ pana rājini asesā sāmantā paṇamanti,
anya-e0810n0:929_20: Saṃ satto laggo anto yassā sā samantā,
anya-e0810n0:930_2: Puññopanītena cakkaratanena vattate asādhudamanikādirājavattaṃ anutiṭṭhatīti cakkavattī, ṇī,
anya-e0810n0:930_3: cakkaratanaṃ vatteti ākāse attano purato gamayatīti vā cakkavattī,
anya-e0810n0:930_7: cakkaratanuppādanatthaṃ dvādasavassacaritaṃ dasarājadhammaṃ vattametassatthīti vā cakkavattī.
anya-e0810n0:930_17: samaṇabrāhmaṇe upasaṅkamitvā pañhapucchananti idaṃ dasavidhaṃ cakkavattivattaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:930_19: pakkhijāte ca visuṃ katvā gahaṇavasena dvādasavidhampi dīpesu.
anya-e0810n0:930_20: Catūsvapi dīpesu āṇādhammacakkāni sattesu pavattetīti vā cakkavattī.
anya-e0810n0:930_21: Añño asabbabhummo anavakāso sāmanto bhūpo maṇḍalissaro nāma.
anya-e0810n0:930_25: cakkavattī”ti dvīhi nāmehi catudīpissaro rājā dīpito,
anya-e0810n0:930_26: idhānāgatepi saṅgahetvā kathitena adhissarapadena ekadīpissaro rājā,
anya-e0810n0:931_2: Sukhumatāya līnā apākaṭā chaviyo yesaṃ te licchavino.
anya-e0810n0:931_5: Purimatarasambhūte sakyakule sañjātattā sakyo, ṇo. Sakkopi.
anya-e0810n0:931_6: Sakye bhavo sākiyo, iyo, yalopo, dīgho ca.
anya-e0810n0:932_7: “Rāhu viya candaṃ mama nikkhamanaṃ lātukāmo cāyaṃ me puttoti rāhuloti nāmena bhavitabba”nti manasi katvā “rāhu jāto,
anya-e0810n0:932_8: bandhanaṃ jāta”nti pitarā vutto sikkhākāmo āyasmā rāhuloyevettha rāhulo,
anya-e0810n0:933_10: Divasavaḷañjo divase divase vaḷañjitabbo pana kahāpaṇo vīsatambaṇamattaṃ hoti,
anya-e0810n0:934_0: Yesaṃ dvijānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ nidhānagāni nidhānavasena pavattāni asītikoṭidhanāni honti,
anya-e0810n0:935_1: vaḷañje ca dhane tadupaḍḍhe tesaṃ dvijamahāsālānaṃ dhanassa upaḍḍhabhāge sati gahapatimahāsālā nāma siyuṃ,
anya-e0810n0:938_0: Napuṃsakaṃ padhānaṃ taṃ, ekatte tu’ttame sadā”ti.
anya-e0810n0:940_15: Sabbakiccesu raññā mantena amā saha bhavatīti amacco,
anya-e0810n0:941_1: Nyāsādīnaṃ iṇādānadāyavibhāgādīnaṃ vivādānaṃ vohārānaṃ upadaṭṭhari upadassite akkhadasso,
anya-e0810n0:945_2: Gāmesu adhikattā adhikā ikkhā anubhavanametassa ajjhakkho, issattaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:949_0: Sassa attano vijigīsabhūtassa desānantaro samantato maṇḍalībhūto rājā satturuccate ekatthābhinivesitattā.
anya-e0810n0:949_2: Arivijigīsamittānaṃ pana maṇḍalānaṃ bahibhūto dūramaṇḍalaṭṭho vijigīsabhūmiyā accantabyavahito balādhikopi yo nāpakarotyupakāroti vā,
anya-e0810n0:949_7: Sattumabhiyuñjamānassa vijigīsassa sattuhitāya yo paṇhiṃ gaṇhati piṭṭhito vattati,
anya-e0810n0:950_3: rapatyavaṇṇaṃ rajateti ripu, u, ittaṃ, rapa, lapa, japa,
anya-e0810n0:950_16: “byañjano ca visaṃyogo”ti sutte caggahaṇena ekatakārassa lopo ca.
anya-e0810n0:950_29: Natthi etasmā īti upaddavoti anīto, mitto,
anya-e0810n0:950_38: dhātvantena saha ṭṭhādeso. Dvesaṇo, duhadayo, dassu, sāttavo,
anya-e0810n0:952_4: mūlavayosaddehi saññāyaṃ sapaccayo yapaccayo (?) pāṇini 4.4.91 suttaṃ passitabbaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:952_16: Atha vā hāni ca āyo ca hāyā, nilopo,
anya-e0810n0:952_25: Parisahanaṃ adussanaṃ, kho, halopo, sakhā, rājādi,
anya-e0810n0:952_26: samāno khyāto patīto vā sakhā, yalopo,
anya-e0810n0:952_31: Sattahi padehi avagamyateti sattapadinaṃ sattapadīna (amara 18.12), ino.
anya-e0810n0:954_2: Carati jānāti paracakkanti caro, a, cāropi, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:954_10: Yena paracakkaṃ sakkā ñātuṃ tappakāravā iccattho.
anya-e0810n0:955_1: Pathe gacchatīti pathāvī, vī, dīgho. Iko, pathiko.
anya-e0810n0:956_0: Dvayaṃ dūte. Du paritāpe, to. Sandesaṃ vācikaṃ haratyaneneti haratīti (?).
anya-e0810n0:960_0: Masijalantu melā ca, pattañjanaṃ masi dvisu.
anya-e0810n0:965_1: Vaṇṇīyati pakāsīyati attho yena, so vaṇṇo,
anya-e0810n0:965_5: khi khaye vā, tadā aro. Likhanaṃ, lipi,
anya-e0810n0:968_0: Santajjanañca bhedoyaṃ, viññūhi tividho mato kāmandakīyanītisāra 17.8.
anya-e0810n0:969_0: Tatrāyaṃ tavānuggatena pavuddho pāsādataravo viya attānañcocchindissatīti saṅkāyaṃ janitāyaṃ snehabhattiñcāpanayati.
anya-e0810n0:969_2: Aññassa ca pariyapaccāmittānuggahaṇassa maraṇamevanto bhavissatītyevaṃpakāramabhibhayanaṃ santajjanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:971_0: Iti daṇḍavidhaññūhi, daṇḍopi tividho mato kāmandakīyanītisāra 17.9.
anya-e0810n0:976_0: Iti sāmavidhaññūhi, sāmaṃ pañcavidhaṃ mataṃ kāmandakīyanītisāra 17.4-5.
anya-e0810n0:977_0: “Asmiṃ evaṃ kate idaṃ amhākaṃ bhavissatī”ti āsādassanaṃ āyatisampakāsanaṃ. Appaṇamityaṅgassa dānaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:978_0: Dānañca pañcadhā sārassāsārassa ca dabbassa gahitassa samappaṇaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:982_0: Deyyassa paṭimokkho ca, dānaṃ pañcavidhaṃ mata”nti kāmandakīyanītisāra 17.6-7.
anya-e0810n0:984_0: “Sāmaṃ dānañca bhedo ca, daṇḍo ceti catukkakaṃ;
anya-e0810n0:993_0: Etā pañca tathā mittaṃ, sattamo pathavīpati;
anya-e0810n0:995_1: balaggahaṇena vā gahaṇasiddhanti neha visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0810n0:995_2: amarakose pana dvīhi gahaṇe siddhepi padhānattākhyāpanatthaṃ visuṃ gahitā.
anya-e0810n0:997_0: Rajjaṅgāni pakatayo, porānaṃ seṇiyopi ce”ti amara 18.17.
anya-e0810n0:998_1: iha tu nāmaliṅgānusāsane abhidhānasatthe anupayogato yathākkamaṃ garuttaṃ na vattumicchatīti byatikkamenopaññāso kato.
anya-e0810n0:1000_1: Pabhāvādīnaṃ vasā sattiyo nāma tisso bhavanti.
anya-e0810n0:1002_3: sā etasmiṃ vijjati tāya nipphādetabbattāti manto,
anya-e0810n0:1002_4: atha vā manta guttabhāsane, bhāve ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:1003_0: So manto dvigocaro dvinnaṃ janānaṃ visayabhūto catukkaṇṇo nāma.
anya-e0810n0:1003_2: So manto tigocaro tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ visayabhūto chakkaṇṇo nāma.
anya-e0810n0:1003_3: Manto nāma catukkaṇṇo vā chakkaṇṇo vā kattabbo,
anya-e0810n0:1004_0: Sabbapārisadattā sabbapāṭhipadattā (ka.) byākaraṇassa sotūnaṃ samayantaresvapi paṭubhāvajananatthaṃ idhānāgatāpi chagguṇādayo ānetvā kathetabbā.
anya-e0810n0:1008_2: tañca viggayhayānaṃ sandhāyayānaṃ sambhūyayānaṃ pasaṅgayānaṃ upekkhiyayānamiti pañcavidhaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1008_8: Aññatra gantabbe aññasmiṃ pasaṅgato gamanaṃ pasaṅgayānaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1009_1: nāhampi para”miti kālādike parikkhitvā vijigīsassa duggādīni vaḍḍhayato ṭhiti āsanaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1009_3: Balīnaṃ sattūnaṃ majjhe kākakkhivā’lakkhitasso’bhayatra vacanenattano samappaṇaṃ dvedhaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1009_6: Sattuno vā pakatīhi sandhāya yo tena viggaho,
anya-e0810n0:1009_7: sattuneva vā yo sandhiviggahasamudāyahetuko sattunova vā sandhiviggahasamudāyahetuno (byākhyāsudhā 1.8.18) duggāsayassa byāpāro,
anya-e0810n0:1010_1: Sattihīno samāsiyate”ti byākhyāsudhā 1.8.18 hīnenāññassa balavatarassa dhammavijayino samāsayanaṃ balavatā
anya-e0810n0:1010_3: tasseva vā balino sattuno kosādippadānena āsayanaṃ āsayo vuccate.
anya-e0810n0:1011_0: Yasmiñca guṇe ṭhito vijigīso sakkotyattano aṭṭhavaggiyakammāni pavattayituṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1012_0: Kasi vaṇijjaṃ patho duggaṃ, setu kuñjarabandhanaṃ;
anya-e0810n0:1015_0: Yasmiṃ vā guṇe ṭhito sakammānaṃ vuḍḍhi,
anya-e0810n0:1015_3: yasmiṃ vā guṇe ṭhito sakammānamupaghātaṃ passati,
anya-e0810n0:1020_2: Avapubbo vada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, bhāve ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:1020_8: Ettha ca ekassevatthassa bhinnaliṅgehi tīhi nāmehi kathanaṃ na kevalaṃ vāccaliṅgoyeva saddo,
anya-e0810n0:1021_1: Āṇa pesane, bhāve a, āṇā, itthī. Avavādo, niddeso,
anya-e0810n0:1021_3: Dvayaṃ bandhane. Dā dāne, bhāve yu,
anya-e0810n0:1028_1: taṃ tamatthaṃ patthentehi ābharīyate ānīyateti pābhataṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1028_7: Paṇṇena satthapaṇṇena saddhiṃ ākarīyate ānīyateti paṇṇākāro,
anya-e0810n0:1030_6: hemaṃ suvaṇṇakhacitaṃ raññaṃ rājūnaṃ āsanaṃ sīhāsanākhyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1032_1: Khaggādayo ime pañca rājūnaṃ kakudhabhaṇḍāni bhavanti.
anya-e0810n0:1032_4: Rañño gamanakāle sadā ādātabbato kakudhāni ca tāni rājadhanattā bhaṇḍāni ceti kakudhabhaṇḍāni.
anya-e0810n0:1033_7: bharati dadhāti udakanti bhiṅgāro, āro. Karako,
anya-e0810n0:1034_0: Hatthī ca asso ca ratho ca patti ca,
anya-e0810n0:1035_9: kuṃ vā pathaviṃ tadāghātena jarayatīti kuñjaro.
anya-e0810n0:1035_21: so viya dissatīti nāgo, ṇo. Karena,
anya-e0810n0:1035_22: mukhena cāti dvīhi pivatīti dvipo. I gamane, bho.
anya-e0810n0:1035_32: jātiyā saṭṭhivassakāle thāmena hāyanato vā saṭṭhihāyano.
anya-e0810n0:1037_15: upagantvā arayo usatīti vā uposatho, tho, usa dāhe,
anya-e0810n0:1037_16: upapubbo vasa nivāse vā, vasso, uposatho,
anya-e0810n0:1037_19: Etesañca kāḷāvako dasannaṃ purisānaṃ balaṃ dhāreti,
anya-e0810n0:1037_22: sammāsambuddho pana dasannaṃ chaddantānaṃ balaṃ dhāreti,
anya-e0810n0:1039_9: tadā karayogā kareṇukā, iṇu. Kariṇī, dhenukā, vasā,
anya-e0810n0:1040_1: Hatthisiropiṇḍā hatthino sirasi dve piṇḍā kumbhākhyā.
anya-e0810n0:1040_4: Dvinnaṃ pana kumbhānaṃ majjhimaṃ vidu nāma amara 18.37.
anya-e0810n0:1040_9: codenti ettha aṅkusādīhi adantanti cūḷikā, dassa ḷo, ṇvu.
anya-e0810n0:1045_0: 365. Dvayaṃ hatthikare. Soṇa vaṇṇagatīsu, ḍo, soḍa gabbe vā, niggahītāgamo, ṇo ca. Dvīsu dvepi.
anya-e0810n0:1046_2: Pusa posane. Kharo, sassa ko, ussottaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1047_12: thī paveṇī kuthaṃ tisū”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 18.42 hi vopālito. Paveṇī,
anya-e0810n0:1048_8: Etasmāyeva pāṭhā sajjakappā sajjanākappanānaṃ pariyāyāti ñeyyā.
anya-e0810n0:1049_2: tuda byathane, aro, dassa mo, ottaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1053_18: sa tu devetyatyatthitena sālībhūtamuninā sakkaṃ payojetvā vajirachedito”ti nikāyantariyā.
anya-e0810n0:1054_5: Padhānassabhūmibhavo sujātiko avikārī kulīnako asso ājānīyo nāma,
anya-e0810n0:1054_6: ā bhuso kāraṇākāraṇaṃ jānātīti ājānīyo, anīyo,
anya-e0810n0:1054_12: Saṅgāme garusatthappahārena nihato santo piyo sāmikaṃ na jahati sukhaṃ vahanasīlo yo asso,
anya-e0810n0:1057_5: kavikāpyatra. Ku sadde. I, ī ca,
anya-e0810n0:1058_0: Assābhitāḷinī vettavikatādi kasā nāma. Kasa gamane, a, karaṇasādhanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1059_4: Vala saṃvaraṇe, vo, ḷattaṃ, ā, vaḷavā.
anya-e0810n0:1061_0: Etthānāgatāpi assassa dhārākhyā dhāvākhyā (ka.) pañca gatiyo kathetabbā. Yathā –
anya-e0810n0:1063_0: Gatiyome pañca dhārā dhāvā (ka.), assānaṃ viññunā matā amara 18.48-9.
anya-e0810n0:1066_0: Yaṃ na raṇāya yuddhatthaṃ cakkayuttaṃ yānaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1067_0: Byagghassa cammāvuto parikkhitto ratho veyyaggho nāma,
anya-e0810n0:1067_4: “Paccattaṃ paccatthaṃ (ka.) ayanti gacchantīti paccayā”ti vacanatthato paccattameva paccatthameva (?) paccayā bhavanti,
anya-e0810n0:1068_3: Sukhatthikehi sevīyateti sivikā, ṇvu, vāgamo, ittaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1068_8: mahāpadesena vā kitakiccapaccayānaṃ kattukammādīsvapi pavatti veditabbā,
anya-e0810n0:1069_5: natthi nāsā yassāti vā anaṃ, sālopo, rasso ca.
anya-e0810n0:1070_6: Yā bhūmiṃ phusati, nī naye, mi,
anya-e0810n0:1073_0: Akkho sakaṭaṃ, tadavayavo vā, tathā cāhājayācariyo –
anya-e0810n0:1076_2: aṇī āṇī ime dvisū”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 18.56 hi ruddo dvidhā paṭhati.
anya-e0810n0:1076_3: “Aṇī āṇī ca akkhaggakīle sīmāssisu matā”ti ca nānatthasaṅgahopi.
anya-e0810n0:1076_12: yathā rathaṃ thiratthaṃ taṭṭhañca gopatīti rathagutti, itthī,
anya-e0810n0:1077_9: Amarakose pana upakkharasaddassa sabbarathāvayavavācakattaṃ vuttaṃ “rathaṅgantu upakkharo”ti amara 18.55.
anya-e0810n0:1079_8: rathena saha gacchatīti vā sārathi, iṇa,
anya-e0810n0:1080_0: “Niyantā pājitā yantā, sūto khattā ca sārathi;
anya-e0810n0:1081_0: Sabyaṭṭho dakkhiṇattho ca, saññā rathakuṭumbino”ti amara 18.56-60. –
anya-e0810n0:1082_2: Rathanāyake tu “rathāroho ca rathiko rathī”ti pacchā vakkhati.
anya-e0810n0:1083_3: Rathena yujjatīti vā rathiko, rathī ca. Rathino,
anya-e0810n0:1084_6: Padena adatīti vā patti, alopo, dassa to, ime dve,
anya-e0810n0:1085_6: vara icchāyaṃ vā, mo, rassa mo.
anya-e0810n0:1085_14: sannāho ca uracchado”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 18.64 byākhyāsudhā 2.8.64 vopālito.
anya-e0810n0:1087_3: Pakkhe “susapacasakato kkhakkā ce”ti sutte cakārena tapaccayassa kko,
anya-e0810n0:1090_4: Dvayaṃ jetuyoggatāmatte. Ji jaye, tabbo, jetabbaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1091_3: vīrayatīti sūro, vīro ca, a, dīghādi,
anya-e0810n0:1092_0: Pātheyyaṃ nāma rājādīnaṃ yātrāsveva bahulaṃ pavattatīti idha taṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1093_8: Ettha ca putanā anīkinī vāhinī camū senābhedepi.
anya-e0810n0:1093_15: Cāṇakye tu senāvisese anīko vutto “tīṇi tikānyanīka”nti.
anya-e0810n0:1096_0: Iti kappā tu pañcassā, vidheyyā kuñjarassa tu;
anya-e0810n0:1097_0: Pādaṅgo pājitāvanto, purisā dasa pañca ca;
anya-e0810n0:1100_0: Karīyate viggaho yeneti cakkaṃ. Bala saṃvaraṇe, a. Aṇa sadde, iko. Vākāro napuṃsakattaṃ samuccinoti.
anya-e0810n0:1101_0: Caturaṅgabalāya susannaddhāya senāya yuddhatthaṃ desavidese vinyāso vibhajitvā nyasanaṃ ṭhapanaṃ byūho kathyate.
anya-e0810n0:1101_5: Maṇḍalaracanāya sarantānamanīkānaṃ sabbato vutti sappasarīramiva maṇḍalo.
anya-e0810n0:1101_6: Ṭhitānamitaretarāsaṃ hatānaṃ visiliṭṭhatarānaṃ anīkānaṃ puthuvutti asaṃhato.
anya-e0810n0:1104_4: taṃ senāya pacchā dhanusatadvayantarena ṭhitaparisasahitaṃ anīkaṃ “paṭiggaho”tyuccate.
anya-e0810n0:1105_2: etena lakkhaṇena adhamantato heṭṭhimaparicchedena tayo hatthino hatthānīkaṃ nāma,
anya-e0810n0:1105_4: eko ca ratho catupurisasahito eko hayo,
anya-e0810n0:1105_5: eko rathoti etena lakkhaṇena adhamantato tayo hayā ca tayo rathā ca hayānīkaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1105_8: Sasatthā khaggādisatthahatthā catujjanā cattāro purisā pattānīkaṃ nāma vuttā.
anya-e0810n0:1109_0: Anīkinī ca tāsantu, dasa akkhobhinī mata”nti amara 18.80-1.
anya-e0810n0:1110_1: tīhi assehi gajenekena rathena ca padātībhi ca pañcahi patti nāma senantaraṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1110_2: Patyaṅgehi sabbehi gajādīhi yathāpubbaṃ guṇehi yathottaraṃ kamena senāmukhādikā saññā bhavati.
anya-e0810n0:1113_0: Saṅkhyā tā turaṅgānañhi, vinā rathe turaṅgame.
anya-e0810n0:1115_0: Satāni tīṇi ca’ññāni, paññāsañca padātayoti byākhyāsudhā 2.8.80.
anya-e0810n0:1116_3: Yantiyā yānaṃ kubbantiyā senāya kattubhūtāya dhūlīkatesu santesu. Kesu?
anya-e0810n0:1119_1: Ādāya yujjhante yanti āvudhaṃ, yassa vo.
anya-e0810n0:1120_2: Muttāmuttañca amuttañca pāṇito muttañca yantamuttañceti sakalaṃ taṃ āyudhaṃ catubbidhaṃ bahūnampi tabbhedānativattanato.
anya-e0810n0:1121_0: Catunnaṃ sarūpamāha “muttāmuttañcā”di. Yaṭṭhi nāma satthaviseso, na kattaradaṇḍo.
anya-e0810n0:1123_0: Tadādi āyudhaṃ muttañca taṃ amuttañceti muttāmuttaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1124_8: nigguṇo kiṃ karissatī”ti hitopadesa kathāmukha 23 pume payogo.
anya-e0810n0:1124_18: kuṭilattā vā kucchito daṇḍo yassatthīti kodaṇḍaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1125_1: Gacchati saro yenāti guṇo, massa ṇo, assu,
anya-e0810n0:1126_16: atha vā khe arati gacchatīti khuro, assu,
anya-e0810n0:1126_19: Asa khipane, kamme yu. Visikho, ajimhago, khago, āsugo, kalambo, maggaṇo,
anya-e0810n0:1127_3: upāsaṅgo ca vāṇadhi”riti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 18.88 amaramālāyaṃ puṃsakaṇḍe.
anya-e0810n0:1133_0: Dvayaṃ asiputtiyaṃ. Chura chedane, ṇvu. Sasu hiṃsāyaṃ,ti, nadādi. Asino puttī, asidhenukāpi.
anya-e0810n0:1134_4: muccatīti vā muggaro, aro. Dughaṇo, ghanopi.
anya-e0810n0:1135_3: sara hiṃsāyaṃ vā, lo, rassa lo.
anya-e0810n0:1136_0: Dvayaṃ vāsiyaṃ. Vasa chedanasnehāvahāraṇesu, ṇī. Taccha tanukaraṇe, yu, nadādi.
anya-e0810n0:1139_6: bhindī ca so vālo cāti bhindivālo,
anya-e0810n0:1145_0: Vīriyādithutiṃ sīlena yo paṭhati, so vandī, tassīlādīsu ṇī.
anya-e0810n0:1146_0: Yo nisāvasānaṃ vibhāvento bodhayati, so vetāḷiko, vibhāvento tāḷasaddena bodhayatīti vetāḷiko, ṇiko.
anya-e0810n0:1147_0: Cakkena caranto bahūhi pīḷetvā yo paṭhati,
anya-e0810n0:1148_8: Kena vātena dalīyate vidārīyateti kadalī, nadādi,
anya-e0810n0:1148_9: chinnabhinnattā kucchitaṃ dalaṃ pattametissātthīti vā kadalī,
anya-e0810n0:1149_4: ahaṃ aggo bhavāmī”ti aññamaññamatikkamma yodhānaṃ samagge dhāvanaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1149_7: sakatthe kapaccaye kate vicchāyaṃ gamyamānattā dvittābhāvo.
anya-e0810n0:1152_3: jāte bhāvini vā raṇe”ti amara 18.103 vuttaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1152_6: devatāyācanapubbakaṃ sajātiyehi saha sambhūya yodhānaṃ yaṃ pānaṃ jāte ca raṇe vijayassa sandassanatthaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1153_26: khalikārepi vattate”ti nānatthasaṅgahe vuttattā na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1155_1: Subhāsubhānaṃ phalānaṃ sūcikā pakāsakā yā bhūtassa vatthuno vikati aññathā uppatti,
anya-e0810n0:1155_3: Subhāsubhaphalaṃ pakāsento patati gacchatīti uppāto. Uppādopi.
anya-e0810n0:1156_4: tañhi dhūmo viya aggissa kammaphalassa pakāsanamattameva karoti,
anya-e0810n0:1157_2: Adhobhāgaṃ bandhanaṃ vā katvā yujjhantyatra nibbuddhaṃ, yassa bo,
anya-e0810n0:1157_14: Apavajjetvā gamanaṃ apakkamo. Padāvo, dāvo, sandāvo, viddavo, davo,
anya-e0810n0:1159_12: attabhāvassa antaṃ karotīti vā kālo, ṇo.
anya-e0810n0:1160_9: Cīyate yatthāti citako, cito ca, to.
anya-e0810n0:1161_7: atha vā senti atrāti sānaṃ, yu,
anya-e0810n0:1161_13: Kucchitaṃ netīti vā kuṇapo, apo, ṇattaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1162_1: Asīsakattā sirosuñño naccanādikriyāsahitattā sahakriyo deho kāyo kabandho “yuddhe yodhesu sūresu sahassaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1162_2: katta (khaṇḍa) muddhasu tadāvesā kabandho tu eko’muddhā kriyāndhito”ti kabandhalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1163_0: Āmakehi kucchitehi apūtigatamatasarīrehi sampuṇṇe āmake susānasmiṃ sivathikā vuttā,
anya-e0810n0:1164_4: Sattūnaṃ karena hatthena maritabbattā karamaro. Paggaho,
anya-e0810n0:1168_2: “nena niddiṭṭhamanicca”nti kātanta 1.2.18 naghaṭitaṃ aniccaṃ (paribhāsendusekhara 97) vuttattā vuddhi,
anya-e0810n0:1170_1: Brahmacārīādayo ete caturo janā assamā nāma bhavanti,
anya-e0810n0:1170_3: Tatra muñjamekhalādiyutto vedajjhāyako brahmacariyāyaṃ ṭhito brahmacārī.
anya-e0810n0:1170_11: Vānapatthassameva tatiyamāyuso bhāgaṃ khepayitvā gahitakāsāvadaṇḍo bhikkho sabbabhūtesu samo jhānāyatanavaro bhikkhu.
anya-e0810n0:1171_1: Sīlādayo tayo sikkhādhamme saha ekato carantā mithu aññamaññaṃ sabrahmacārino nāma,
anya-e0810n0:1172_1: Manasā upecca sissānaṃ vajjāvajjaṃ jhāyatīti upajjhāyo,
anya-e0810n0:1173_0: Dvayaṃ nissayadāyake. Sissānaṃ hitaṃ ācaratīti ācariyo, ṇyo. Nissayaṃ dadātīti, kammādimhi ṇvu.
anya-e0810n0:1174_2: Atha vā yo dvijo brāhmaṇo yaṃkiñci brāhmaṇaṃ upanīya attano santikaṃ ānetvā kappādichaḷaṅgikattā sāṅgaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1174_3: saguyhattā rahassañca vedaṃ kammabhūtaṃ pubbaṃ paṭhamameva kenaci asikkhāpiteyeva ajjhāpaye sikkhāpeyya,
anya-e0810n0:1174_5: ādito cāreti sikkhāpetīti ācariyoti katvā, ṇyo.
anya-e0810n0:1175_6: “Itiha pubbācariyehi vuttamida”nti kathetabbaṃ vacanaṃ etihyaṃ, ṇyo.
anya-e0810n0:1176_5: Yāgatthaṃ mantādinā parikkhatā parisaṅkhatā bhū bhūmi vedi nāma,
anya-e0810n0:1177_2: Porāṇakarājakāle kira sassamedhaṃ purisamedhaṃ sammāpāsaṃ vācāpeyyanti cattāri saṅgahavatthūni ahesuṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1177_8: Daliddamanussānaṃ hatthato lekhaṃ gahetvā tīṇi vassāni vinā vaḍḍhiyā sahassadvisahassamattadhanānuppadānaṃ sammāpāsaṃ nāma.
anya-e0810n0:1177_9: Tañhi sammā manusse pāseti hadaye bandhitā viya ṭhapeti,
anya-e0810n0:1177_11: “Tāta mātulā”tyādinā pana saṇhavācāya bhaṇanaṃ vācāpeyyaṃ nāma,
anya-e0810n0:1177_13: Evaṃ catūhi vatthūhi saṅgahitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ iddhañceva hoti phītañca pahūtannapānaṃ khemaṃ nirabbudaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1177_14: Manussā mudā pamodamānā ure putte naccentā apārutagharadvārā viharanti,
anya-e0810n0:1177_15: idaṃ gharadvāresu aggaḷānaṃ abhāvato niraggaḷanti vuccati,
anya-e0810n0:1177_17: aparabhāge pana okkākarājakāle brāhmaṇā imāni cattāri saṅgahavatthūni,
anya-e0810n0:1177_18: imañca raṭṭhasampattiṃ parivattentā uddhaṃ mūlaṃ katvā “assamedha”ntiādike pañca yaññe nāma akaṃsu,
anya-e0810n0:1179_0: Te tattha mante ganthetvā, okkākaṃ tadupāgamu”nti su. ni. 301, 304.
anya-e0810n0:1180_1: Tattha assaṃ ettha medhanti vadhantīti assamedho.
anya-e0810n0:1180_3: Sammā yugacchidde pakkhipitabbadaṇḍakaṃ pāsenti khipenti ettha sammāpāso.
anya-e0810n0:1180_6: Sabbassa attano sāpateyyassa anigūhitvā niravasesato dinnattā natthi ettha aggaḷāti niraggaḷo,
anya-e0810n0:1181_4: Atha vā itthiyā utumhi jāte jāyatīti itthītujo.
anya-e0810n0:1181_7: Parasamayaṃ amanasi katvā pana ācariyena itidvijasaddo iditvijasaddo ca samānatthāti maññamānena “idi tvijo”ti vuttaṃ siyā,
anya-e0810n0:1182_3: Samājaṃ janasaṅghātaṃ samāvasanti āgantvā ekadesī bhavantīti samājā,
anya-e0810n0:1183_15: Āgantvā tiṭṭhantyassaṃ aṭṭhānī, yu, nadādi, rassādi.
anya-e0810n0:1184_17: avasesā pana sabbepi devamanussādayo itthipurisavasena dve koṭṭhāse katvā liṅgasabhāgavasena dvīsu saṅgahitā,
anya-e0810n0:1184_18: brahmāno pana liṅgābhāvepi purisasaṇṭhānattā purisesu saṅgahitā,
anya-e0810n0:1185_0: Evaṃ catūhi koṭṭhāsehi parisaṃ dassetvā aṭṭhahipi dassetumāha “athave”ccādi.
anya-e0810n0:1185_4: Tāvatiṃsānaṃ dvijānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ khattānaṃ khattiyānaṃ mārassa gahapatissa samaṇānaṃ cātumahārājikānaṃ
anya-e0810n0:1185_6: seṭṭhavasena ca vuttāti na ettha pubbe viya sabbā saṅgahitā,
anya-e0810n0:1186_1: Gāyatti nāma yassa catūsu pādesu paṭipādaṃ chaḷakkharāni santi,
anya-e0810n0:1186_2: sā pamukhamādi yassa utthādīnaṃ pāyenānupayogattā gāyattipamukhaṃ chandaṃ nāma.
anya-e0810n0:1186_3: Gāyateti gāyatti, ge sadde, tti, e aya.
anya-e0810n0:1189_1: vedānaṃ ādibhūtañca gāyatti viya chandānaṃ nāpi catuppadaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:1189_5: “sāvitti chandaso mukhaṃ” ma. ni. 2.400; su. ni. 573,
anya-e0810n0:1189_11: Savitussa isino ayaṃ vācā sāvitti, iṇa.
anya-e0810n0:1190_7: Homadabbiyaṃ homakammani habyannādīnamuddharaṇatthaṃ katāyaṃ kaṭacchuyaṃ sujā, itthī,
anya-e0810n0:1191_3: asitabbassa cāti dvinnampi bhāvānaṃ sambhavato pāyāso,
anya-e0810n0:1193_9: Ettha ca gāhapaccaggādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vippaṭipajjantānaṃ vināsahetubhāvato aggitādaṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0810n0:1194_3: mātāpitaro hi puttānaṃ bahūpakāratāya āhunaṃ arahanti,
anya-e0810n0:1194_6: anudahamānassa pana paccayo hotīti anudahanaṭṭheneva “āhuneyyaggī”ti vuccati.
anya-e0810n0:1194_17: tasmiṃ micchāpaṭipanno gihī bhikkhusaṅghaṃ akkositvā nirayādīsu nibbattati,
anya-e0810n0:1195_1: Kaṭṭhato nibbatto pākatikova aggi kaṭṭhaggi nāmāti a. ni. aṭṭha.
anya-e0810n0:1196_14: maccherasotātikkamanamettha taraṇaṃ. Hā cāge, curādi, to, yālopo,
anya-e0810n0:1197_12: mahatthaṃ vā buddhabhāvatthaṃ kato pariccāgo mahāpariccāgo,
anya-e0810n0:1197_13: kāpurisehi dukkarattā mahanto vā seṭṭho pariccāgo mahāpariccāgo.
anya-e0810n0:1198_1: Dānapāramīādikānaṃ tissannaṃ pāramīnaṃ vasena asādhāraṇadānavatthuṃ dassetvā sādhāraṇadānavatthuṃ dassetumāha “annaṃ pāna”miccādi.
anya-e0810n0:1198_2: Tatra annaṃ pānavajjitaṃ yaṃ kiñci khādanīyādikaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1198_4: Yānaṃ hatthyādi antamaso upāhanaṃ upādāya gamanasādhanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:1198_12: Padīpeyyaṃ padīpassa hitaṃ yaṃ kiñci telādi,
anya-e0810n0:1198_19: Etāni pana dasa dānavatthūni suttantanayena kathitāni.
anya-e0810n0:1198_21: rūpādichaḷārammaṇadānavasena hi abhidhamme cha dānavatthūni āgatāni,
anya-e0810n0:1198_24: Annādidānamattavaseneva yassa kassaci dussīlādikassa dātabbanti anujānitvā piṇḍapātādikappiyavohāravasena
anya-e0810n0:1198_28: Rūpādīsu paramatthavaseneva abhinivisitvā dānavasena tatopi atisayadānattā”ti.
anya-e0810n0:1198_29: Mayaṃ pana suttantanayadānaṃ vā hotu vinayābhidhammanayadānaṃ vā,
anya-e0810n0:1199_2: etaṃ dānaṃ dehā uddhe bhavaṃ uddhadehikaṃ nāma.
anya-e0810n0:1199_6: taṃva tameva pitudānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇabhojanādi saddhaṃ nāma,
anya-e0810n0:1201_3: Āgantvādayo pajjapariyantā satta saddā tīsu liṅgesu.
anya-e0810n0:1202_6: upapubbo hara pūjāyaṃ, ṇo, upahāro, pume.
anya-e0810n0:1203_10: rahosaddo viya hi namosaddotra dvidhā vattati.
anya-e0810n0:1205_1: Sakkārapubbaṅgamaṃ katvā garuādīnaṃ ārādhanīyānaṃ kvaci atthe niyojanaṃ patthanāviseso ajjhesanā,
anya-e0810n0:1206_0: 428. Catukkaṃ anussaraṇe. Esa gavesane, yāgame pariyesanā. Timhi pariyeṭṭhi. Gavesa maggane.
anya-e0810n0:1207_4: “bhujaghasaharasupādīhi tumicchatthesū”ti sapaccayo, dvittādi, sussūsā, sā itthī.
anya-e0810n0:1209_3: ubhayatrāpi tassa ṭo, i. Sā itthī.
anya-e0810n0:1211_6: Ettha ca tapādayo mukhyavasena kusalasīle vattanti,
anya-e0810n0:1212_7: Puthu visuṃbhūto gaṇādīhi attā sarīraṃ mano sabhāvo ca etesanti puthugattā,
anya-e0810n0:1212_11: evaṃsarūpā vā amhepi nesaṃ pakati”riti pakatipurisānaṃ vibhāgena ñāṇaviveko.
anya-e0810n0:1213_5: tadaññaṃ khuddānukhuddakato aññaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlādikaṃ sīlaṃ brahmacariyassāriyamaggassa ādimhi
anya-e0810n0:1214_1: Pāpehi akusaladhammehi upāvatto upāvuto (ka.) anāvuto vigato sabbannapānabhogādīhi vivajjitova hutvā
anya-e0810n0:1214_2: guṇehi sīlādīhi saddhiṃ yo vāso vasanaṃ thambhanamatthi,
anya-e0810n0:1216_8: saṃsārassa vā pāraṃ gamanato isi, i.
anya-e0810n0:1217_5: Yataṃ indriyasaṃyamo niccametesamatthīti yatino, ī. Yatayopi,
anya-e0810n0:1218_3: Tussantyasmiṃ atthasiddhitoti tisso, so, tussi ca.

anya-e0810n0:1383_2: Khaṃ kaṇṭhavivaraṃ mahantamassatthīti kharo, ro. Cakkavā, bāleyyo,

anya-e0810n0:2085_4: Ettha anekatthavagge ekassa bhūtasaddādikassa yā punaruttatā,
anya-e0810n0:2086_1: Samavāyatthādivācake bahavo samayasadde jātiyā saṅgayha “samayo”ti ekavacananiddeso kato.

anya-e0810n0:2086_8: “Ekoyeva ca kho khaṇo ca samayo cā”tyādīsu a. ni.
anya-e0810n0:2087_0: Tattha sahakārīkāraṇatāya sannijjhaṃ sameti samavetīti samayo, samavāyo. Samaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:2087_1: saha vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo, samūho, yathā –
anya-e0810n0:2087_3: Avasesapaccayānaṃ samāgame eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati pavattati cāti samayo, kāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:2087_5: Sametisamāgacchati ettha maggabrahmacariyaṃ tadādhārapuggalehīti samayo, khaṇo.
anya-e0810n0:2087_6: Abhimukhaṃ ñāṇena sammā etabbo avagantabboti abhisamayo,
anya-e0810n0:2087_8: Abhimukhabhāvena sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti abhisamayo,
anya-e0810n0:2087_14: dhammappavattimattatāya atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ viya,
anya-e0810n0:2087_15: karaṇaṃ viya ca parikappanāmattasiddhena rūpena voharīyatīti.
anya-e0810n0:2087_17: sammā vā yānaṃ apagamoti samayo, pahānaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2087_20: sameti sambandho eti attano visaye pavattati,
anya-e0810n0:2087_21: daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato vā sampayuttā ayanti pavattanti sattā yathābhinivesaṃ etenāti samayo, diṭṭhi.
anya-e0810n0:2087_23: evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samayasaddassa pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0810n0:2087_25: anupasaggo ca samayasaddo samavāyādyatthavācako hotīti dassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2089_1: Pātimokkhassa bhikkhubhikkhunīnaṃ vasena duvidhassa pātimokkhassa uddese “saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyā”ti mahāva. 134.
anya-e0810n0:2090_5: Uracakkaṃ nāma khuracakkaṃ “cakkaṃ bhamati matthake”ti jā. 1.1.104; 1.5.100.
anya-e0810n0:2090_10: yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ vattatī”tyādīsu a. ni.
anya-e0810n0:2090_14: Maṇḍalaṃ “alātacakka”ntyādīsu “asanivicakka”nti dī. ni. 3.61; saṃ. ni. 2.162 ca.
anya-e0810n0:2094_0: Gāthāicceva niddiṭṭhaṃ, munindavacane panā”ti vuttodaya 14-15 gāthā hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2104_0: Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:2109_0: “Taṃ kho pana pañcasikha brahmacariyaṃ neva nibbidāya na virāgāya yāvadeva brahmalokūpapattiyā”ti dī. ni.
anya-e0810n0:2109_2: “Tayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ puthubhūtaṃ yāvadeva manussesu suppakāsita”nti dī. ni.
anya-e0810n0:2111_0: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
anya-e0810n0:2112_0: Tena pāṇi kāmadado, tena pāṇi madhussavo;
anya-e0810n0:2113_0: Tena me brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhatī”ti pe. va. 275. –
anya-e0810n0:2118_0: Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na miyyare”ti jā. 1.10.97. –
anya-e0810n0:2121_0: “Idaṃ kho pana pañcasikha brahmacariyaṃ ekantanibbidāya virāgāya…pe…
anya-e0810n0:2121_1: ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti dī. ni.
anya-e0810n0:2123_0: Majjhimena ca devattaṃ, uttamena visujjhatī”ti jā. 1.8.75. –
anya-e0810n0:2125_2: caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritvā tapassi sudaṃ homī”ti ma. ni.
anya-e0810n0:2133_8: yassa vasena bhinnesu sabalādīsu abhinnā dhīsaddā vattante.
anya-e0810n0:2135_0: 794. Phale sotāpattādike. Aniccādianupassanā vipassanā nāma. Magge sotāpattimaggādike.
anya-e0810n0:2142_0: 802. Vatthaṃ ambaraṃ. Añño yo sako na hoti. Odhi mariyādo. Bhedo viseso. Manasipi cittepi.
anya-e0810n0:2145_0: 805. Bodhisaddo ñāṇadvaye nāriyaṃ, bodhirājakumārādipaññattiyaṃ pume. Assattharukkhe pumitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2150_0: 810. Jāmātā dhītusāmiko. Mandappiye appapiye varaṃ abyayaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2152_0: 812. Pitāmaho brahmā. Pitūsu mātāpitūsu. Tathā pakkhantare. Tapasi sīle.
anya-e0810n0:2156_0: 817. Semhādo tidose. Rasarattādi pubbevutto. Pabhādike rūpadhātumhi. Cakkhādike visayadhātumhi.
anya-e0810n0:2158_0: 819. Parittāṇaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ. Vatthumhi okāse. Tallañchanaṃ pādassa ṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2159_0: 820. Lohamuggare lohamaye muggare. Tāḷādike sammatāḷakaṃsatāḷādike. Kaṭhine kakkhaḷe.
anya-e0810n0:2160_3: Madhumhi khuddaṃ appakādīsu catūsvatthesu vattamānaṃ tīsu liṅgesu.
anya-e0810n0:2163_0: 824. Mittākāre amittassāpi mittasaṇṭhāne. Bale, rāsimhi, vipattiyañca, “balassa rāsī”tipi eke.
anya-e0810n0:2164_0: 825. Khandhe rūpakkhandhe. Bhave rūpabhave. Nimittamhi kāraṇe. Vapu sarīraṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2166_0: 827. Vajjabhaṇḍamukhe vīṇādoṇimukhe. Mātaṅgassa hatthino karakoṭi hatthaggaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2175_0: 837. Vevacanaṃ abhinnattho saddo. Pakārasmiṃ bhede. Avasaro avakāso.
anya-e0810n0:2176_4: Cittamāso puṇṇenduyuttena cittena nakkhattena lakkhito māso.
anya-e0810n0:2177_0: 839. Sāmale nīle. Sayamatthe sayaṃsaddassa atthe. Sārivā upāsakā.
anya-e0810n0:2179_0: 841. Accite pūjite. Khinne kilamathappatte. Samite upasamite.
anya-e0810n0:2181_0: 842. Visuddhidevo, sammutidevo, upapattidevo cāti visuddhidevādi. Nabhaṃ ākāso.
anya-e0810n0:2184_0: Paccanīko sattu. Aññe aññatthe. Pacchābhāge “dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā”ti.
anya-e0810n0:2188_0: 848. Khandhakoṭṭhāso aṇḍajādicatukkaṃ. Passāvamaggo itthīnaṃ yoni. So pulliṅgo. Kūle tīre.
anya-e0810n0:2189_0: 849. Nāgotunāgasaddo tu. Urage sappe, hatthini ca.
anya-e0810n0:2194_0: 854. Khaggakose khaggapidhāne. Paṭicchade samantato chādane. Sārambhe kolāhale.
anya-e0810n0:2195_0: 855. Kālaviseso dasaccharakālo. Nibyāpāraṭṭhiti aciraṭṭhiti, aciraṭṭhitīti dasaccharatopi ūnaṭṭhiti.
anya-e0810n0:2198_0: 857. Saddhāya aparappaccaye. Cīvarādīsu catūsu. Ādhāro nissayo.
anya-e0810n0:2199_0: Dibbavihāro, ariyavihāro, brahmavihāro cāti dibbavihārādi. Sugatālaye bhikkhūnamāvāse.
anya-e0810n0:2202_0: 859. Sappaphaṇaṅgesūti sappassa phaṇe, aṅge ca sarīre. Koṭille kuṭilatāya. Bhuñjanaṃ bhojanakriyā.
anya-e0810n0:2203_0: Bhūmibhāge rājaṅgaṇādimhi. Kilese saṃkilese. Male rāgādike.
anya-e0810n0:2209_0: 863. Niyyāse silese. Sekhare sīse. Nāgadantake bhittiādīsu pavesite nāgadantākāre daṇḍe.
anya-e0810n0:2210_0: Sikhaṇḍo piñchaṃ. Tūṇīre usunidhimhi. Nikare samūhe.
anya-e0810n0:2212_0: Kambu jalajantuviseso. Nalāṭaṭṭhi nalāṭe jātaṭṭhi. Gopphake pādagaṇṭhimhi.
anya-e0810n0:2214_0: Dese desavisese. Aṇṇave samudde, ete pume. So sindhusaddo saritāyaṃ nadiyaṃ bhave.
anya-e0810n0:2215_0: 866. Kareṇusaddo gaje hatthimhi, purise pulliṅge vattati. Hatthiniyaṃ tu itthiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2216_0: Ratane ratanavisese. Maṇivedho nāma yaṃ loke “cina” iti vuccati. Indaheti indāvudho.
anya-e0810n0:2223_0: 868. Vaṇippathe vāṇijānaṃ vohārakammapathe. Vede vedavisese, vāṇijepi nigamo.
anya-e0810n0:2225_0: 869. Pasumhi goṇe. Vasudhā pathavī. Vācā vacanaṃ. Ādinā saggaraṃsivajiracandajalādayo gahitā.
anya-e0810n0:2228_0: Kaṇṇapūro kaṇṇālaṅkāro. Sekhare agge. Ete dvinnampi atthā.
anya-e0810n0:2232_0: Nārī āsīsaddo sappadāṭhāyaṃ. Iṭṭhassa vatthuno āsīsanāyaṃ patthanāyampi itthī eva.
anya-e0810n0:2233_0: 873. Vilīnatele visaraṇatele. Vasagā vasaṃ gacchantī nārī. Vañcyagāvī anavacchā sorabheyī.
anya-e0810n0:2234_0: Abhilāse icchāyaṃ. Kiraṇe raṃsimhi. Abhisaṅge laggane.
anya-e0810n0:2235_0: 874. Aṃse koṭṭhāse. Sippe nāṭakasatthāgate. Candassa soḷasame bhāge ca kalā.
anya-e0810n0:2237_0: Āgāmikāle anāgatakāle. Pabhāvo daṇḍatejo. Saṃyamepi āyati bhave.
anya-e0810n0:2238_0: 876. Mesādilome eḷakādīnaṃ lome. Bhūmajjhe dvinnaṃ bhūnaṃ majjhe jātāyaṃ romadhātuyaṃ lome.
anya-e0810n0:2241_0: Suṇisāyaṃ puttassa bhariyāyaṃ. Kaññāyaṃ anibbiddhāyaṃ. Jāyāyaṃ bhariyāsāmaññe.
anya-e0810n0:2243_0: Pāvacane buddhavacane. Siddhe siddhante. Tante suttamaye. Supite niddāsīle.
anya-e0810n0:2245_0: 880. Vohāre vāṇijakamme. Kīḷādo kīḷādimhi. Ādinā jutithutigatyādayo saṅgahitā.
anya-e0810n0:2247_0: 881. Sussūsāyaṃ sotumicchāyaṃ. Issātyāse sarābhyāse. Hiṃsanepi upāsanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2249_0: 882. Vīṇāguṇo vīṇāyajiyā. Tantaṃ tantasaddo. Mukhyaṃ padhānaṃ. Siddhantaṃ udāharaṇaṃ. Tantu suttaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2251_0: 883. Itthipupphaṃ itthīnaṃ utu. Reṇu dhūlī. Pakatije guṇe tiṇṇaṃ guṇānaṃ dutiye guṇe.
anya-e0810n0:2252_0: Nyāsappaṇe ṭhapitassa dhanassa dāne. Dānamhi tadaññassa dāne.
anya-e0810n0:2254_0: Jotisaddo nakkhattaraṃsīsu paṇḍake napuṃsake. Aggimhi tu so pumā.
anya-e0810n0:2255_0: 885. “Iti sandhikappe paṭhamo kaṇḍo”tyādīsu vagge. Avasarepi, avasaro avakāso.
anya-e0810n0:2256_0: Atha bāhudvayassa uddhaṃ māne. Sūratte sūrabhāve.
anya-e0810n0:2257_0: 886. Porisaṃ purisakāro. Īhā vīriyaṃ. Nisinnādyuggamo nisinnādiko uggamo ṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2258_0: Anissayamahībhāge lokanissayabhūtānaṃ tarupabbatanagarādīnaṃ abhāvato anissayasaṅkhāte suññamahīkoṭṭhāse.
anya-e0810n0:2260_0: Sānumhi pabbatassa same bhūbhāge. Visāṇe mātaṅgadante, pasūnaṃ siṅge ca.
anya-e0810n0:2262_0: Suvaṇṇo pañcadharaṇaṃ. Pañcasuvaṇṇo nikkho. Pasādhanaṃ alaṅkāraviseso.
anya-e0810n0:2264_0: Balavāmukho yatra plavādayo sīghasotena ākaḍḍhitvā pavesiyanti.
anya-e0810n0:2265_0: 890. Kāmaje taṇhāje surāpānādike. Dose aparādhe. Kopaje daṇḍapharusādike ca. Vipattiyaṃ vināse.
anya-e0810n0:2266_0: Upakaraṇaṃ kulālādīnaṃ daṇḍacakkādi. Siddhi nipphatti. Kārako kattādisattavidho.
anya-e0810n0:2270_0: Sassate nicce. Takke vitakke. Nicchite vinicchite.
anya-e0810n0:2271_0: 894. Hare mahissare sivo, bhadde kalyāṇe. Mokkhe nibbāne ca sivaṃ. Jambuke siṅgāle sivā.
anya-e0810n0:2279_0: Kathite devavisese. Ratane ratanasāmaññe, dhane ca, paṇḍakaṃ napuṃsakaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2280_0: 896. Atthagamane vināsagamane. Apavagge sabbakilesānaṃ khayahetubhūte virāgadhamme.
anya-e0810n0:2281_0: Setambuje setakamale. Rukkhantare “puṇḍarīka”iti khyāte dumavisese, dvīsvatthesu pume.
anya-e0810n0:2286_3: “puññaṃ dhammamanitthiya”nti ettha dhammasaddassa anitthibhāvassa vuttattā sukkasaddo tīsu vutto.
anya-e0810n0:2287_2: Pitūnaṃ dhane petānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ puttehi vibhajitabbadhane ca.
anya-e0810n0:2288_0: Pabhuno puggalassa bhāvo pabhuttaṃ, tathā āyattassa bhāvo āyattatā. Āyatto puggalo. Abhilāso icchā.
anya-e0810n0:2289_0: 899. Dhanimhi saddamatte. Yodhasīhanādamhi yodhānaṃ abhītanāde ca seḷanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2291_1: Sādhakatame kattuto aññesaṃ kriyāsādhakatame karaṇakārake, kriyāyaṃ,
anya-e0810n0:2296_1: Kesasaddo pubbo yassa pāsasaddassa so kesapubbo.
anya-e0810n0:2301_0: 907. Yuvarājā pitari devaṅgate rājabhāvāraho rājaputto. Khande harassa putte. Susu taruṇo.
anya-e0810n0:2302_0: Maṇibhede yo loke “santā”ti vuccati. Aṅkure rukkhādīnaṃ aṅkure.
anya-e0810n0:2303_0: 908. Vetanaṃ kammakārehi labhitabbadhanaṃ. Mūlaṃ mūladhanaṃ. Vohāre vāṇijakamme.
anya-e0810n0:2305_0: 909. Asubhe ca kamme subhe ca kamme dvayepi kamme cāti tīsvatthesu bhāgyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2311_0: 913. Mukhye padhāne. Upāye hetumhi. Vadane lapane. Ādismiṃ paṭhame.
anya-e0810n0:2313_0: 914. Patthādo pattho, tulā, aṅgulīti patthādi. Vidhāya unnatiyaṃ. Parissame khede.
anya-e0810n0:2314_0: 915. Saroruhe kamale. Khagantare rukkhakimikhādakasakuṇe. Tūriyantare vaṃsasaṅkhādike.
anya-e0810n0:2317_0: 918. Māse tatiyamāse. Ativuddhe ca atipasatthe ca.
anya-e0810n0:2320_0: 920. Maṇḍale parimaṇḍale. Bimbikā latājāti, tassā phale ca bimbaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2323_0: Cāpe dhanumhi issāsaṃ. Usuno sarassa khepakamhi perake issāso.
anya-e0810n0:2325_0: Soṇite lohite. Tambaṃ udumbaraṃ. Anuratto anurāgayutto puggalo. Rañjitaṃ raṅgarañjitaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2326_0: 924. Viraḷe nirantare. Kise athūle. Hime tuhine.
anya-e0810n0:2327_0: 925. Guḷabhedo yo loke “sakkharā”ti vuccati. Kaṭhale silākhaṇḍe.
anya-e0810n0:2328_0: 926. Tikhiṇe tikkhe. Byatte cheke. Rogamutte niroge.
anya-e0810n0:2329_0: Khattiye muddhābhisitte. Naranāthe tadaññasmiṃ. Pabhumhi issare.
anya-e0810n0:2330_0: 927. Dhaññakaraṇaṃ dhaññamaddanaṭṭhānaṃ. Kakke nahānacuṇṇe. Nīce adhame. Setepi khalo.
anya-e0810n0:2331_0: 928. Brahmacārī ca gahaṭṭho ca vānappattho ca bhikkhu cāti brahmacārīgahaṭṭhādi, tapodhane piyasīle.
anya-e0810n0:2333_0: 929. Kaniṭṭho ca kaniyo cāti ete tīsu. Kutratthesu? Atyappe, atiyuvepi.
anya-e0810n0:2334_0: Iṭṭhe, nissāre ca agarumhi cāti etesvatthesu tīsu.
anya-e0810n0:2335_0: 930. Adhobhāge ca hīne ca. Dantacchade dantāvaraṇe.
anya-e0810n0:2338_0: Āvāṭe kāsuyaṃ. Udapānaṃ andhu, yatra jalaṃ ghaṭiyantena uddharitvā pivanti.
anya-e0810n0:2339_0: 932. Paṭhamaṃ pamukhañcāti idaṃ abhidhānadvayaṃ ādimhi padhāne vattati.
anya-e0810n0:2343_0: 934. Mandire gehe. Rogabhede khayaroge. Apacayamhi viddhaṃsane, vināse ca.
anya-e0810n0:2344_0: Sāpade byagghādike duṭṭhamige. Sappe urage. Kurūre kakkhaḷe.
anya-e0810n0:2346_0: Sote kaṇṇe. Yajane pūjane. Sutiyaṃ savanakriyāyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2347_0: 936. Peto ca paretocāti ime mate kālaṅkate ca petayonije petayonisambhave siyuṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2355_0: Añjase magge. Visikhā racchā. Pantiyaṃ pāḷiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2358_0: 942. Saṅghaṭṭane dvinnaṃ antarabhūte. Puna sandhīti padapūraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Atisante atisamite.
anya-e0810n0:2359_0: 943. Yāpanā yāpanakārako kabaḷīkārāhāraraso. Ditti jalanaṃ. Balaṃ thāmo.
anya-e0810n0:2361_1: Itivutte ca kammanīti “iti evaṃ mayā pubbe carita”nti vattabbe subhāsubhakamme.
anya-e0810n0:2365_0: Vase āyattatāyaṃ. Vede catubbidhavede. Icchā ārammaṇicchā.
anya-e0810n0:2368_0: Vadhe māraṇe. Rakkhitasmiṃ kammani, kattari ca.
anya-e0810n0:2369_0: 949. Thiyaṃ itthiyaṃ. Piye sāmike. Manuññe manaso tosanajanake. Gavakkhe sīhapañjare.
anya-e0810n0:2370_0: 950. Kiṃ saddo pucchanatthādīsu saliṅgo. Vikappatthādīsu tu abyayaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2371_0: Sasaddhe saddhāya sahite. Nivāpe petādīnaṃ kattabbapūjādāne. Paccaye saddahane saddhā.
anya-e0810n0:2379_0: 955. Ghammo nidāgho cāti dve abhidhānāni. Sedajale kāyato mutte.
anya-e0810n0:2380_0: Kantane chedane. Vikappe vitakke. Sajjane hatthādīnaṃ sajjane.
anya-e0810n0:2387_2: Viññāṇe suttassa viññāṇe citte taṃ supinavacanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2388_0: 958. Paccakkhe sammukhe. Sannidhāne payoge, vidhāne ca. Bhiyyosaddo pahūtaratthe so pumā.
anya-e0810n0:2389_0: 959. Visalittasare visena lepitasare diddho pumā. Litte lepitabbasāmaññe.
anya-e0810n0:2390_0: Vāse vasane. Dhūmādisaṅkhāre gandhacuṇṇadhūmādinā abhisaṅkhāre. Sampaṭicchane paṭiggahaṇe.
anya-e0810n0:2395_0: 962. Lūkhe samale, kakkhaḷe ca. Niṭṭhuravācāyaṃ akaṇṇasukhavacane.
anya-e0810n0:2399_0: 966. Lohe kāḷāyase satthaṃ. Sañcaye samūhe sattho. Yathā “sakaṭasattho”tyādi. Vattane pavattane.
anya-e0810n0:2401_0: 968. Kaṇḍe vāṇe. Vāpimhi dīghikādikāyaṃ. Dupphasse dukkhasamphasse. Kakace kharapatte.
anya-e0810n0:2402_2: yāya pītāya mattā sattā anāgamanīyavatthūsupi gacchanti.
anya-e0810n0:2402_4: Kāmupadhiādīsu catūsu upadhīsu ca upadhi, anitthī.
anya-e0810n0:2403_0: 970. Dabbe dhanādike. Bhūbhedo vatthādi. Mahārāje catūsu mahārājesu ekasmiṃ mahārāje. Nare satte.
anya-e0810n0:2405_0: 972. Vohārasmiṃ rathasakaṭādivohāre. Upaṭṭhitagirā saddato atthato ca pākaṭagirā.
anya-e0810n0:2409_0: “Madhu khudde jale khīre, majje puppharase madhu;
anya-e0810n0:2410_0: Racche citte vasante ca, jīvasāke madhuddume”ti. –
anya-e0810n0:2412_0: Ulloceti seyyādīnaṃ uparibhāge rajopātanivāraṇatthaṃ ṭhapite dussamayādike.
anya-e0810n0:2416_0: Amato amatā sivā-gaḷo jhāmalakīsu ce”ti medinīkosa 16.77-8 gāthāyampi.
anya-e0810n0:2417_0: Nānatthasaṅgahe vuttaṃ. Mohe avijjāyaṃ. Timire andhakāre. Saṅkhyā gaṇanaviseso. Guṇe tatiye guṇe.
anya-e0810n0:2418_4: Sukate kusale dhamme puññaṃ paṇḍake napuṃsake.
anya-e0810n0:2420_0: 979. Lañchane paṭibimbe. Sīmā mariyādo. Pakāro tulyo.
anya-e0810n0:2421_0: 980. Mantane catukkaṇṇādike. Byasane bhogabyasanādike. Vipattiyaṃ anatthe.
anya-e0810n0:2422_0: 981. Raṃsibhedo pubbe udayato sūriyassa raṃsiviseso. Abyattarāge kiñciratte. Lohite ratte.
anya-e0810n0:2427_0: 982. Avataraṇe otaraṇe. Titthasmiṃ nadyādīnaṃ titthe. Vivare vivaraṇe. Iṅgite sīsacalanādike.
anya-e0810n0:2428_1: Khattā khattiyato sañjāte sudditthitanaye sudditthiyā putte ca.
anya-e0810n0:2430_2: Yasmiṃ gehe palinā patite asubhanimittaṃ karonti.
anya-e0810n0:2432_0: 986. Kaṭhine kakkhaḷe. Sāhaso balakkāro. Appiye amanāpe. Cīre nantake, vāke ca cīraṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2439_0: 993. Gāmasandohe gāmasamūhe. Paridhi pariveso sūriyādigehaṃ. Āgame buddhavacane. Lekhe vācitalekhe.
anya-e0810n0:2443_0: 997. Itthinimitte itthiyā aṅgajāte. Kilañje vilīvamaye. So kaṭasaddo kate tīsu.
anya-e0810n0:2448_2: kilañje ca sare kaṭo”ti tikaṇḍaseso tikaṇḍasesa 3.3.93.
anya-e0810n0:2449_0: 998. Mathite gorasavisese. Sūciphale ambilapattaphale. Duddasetare passituṃ adukkare.
anya-e0810n0:2450_0: 999. Antarīpaṃ jalamajjhathalaṃ. Pajjoto padīpo. Bandho sambandho. Mihite īsaṃhasite.
anya-e0810n0:2453_0: 1002. Vajjanatthādīsu tīsu parihāro. Pañhavissajjanepi parihāro. Dvije brāhmaṇe. Vessepi ariyo.
anya-e0810n0:2463_0: 1012. Meghapāsāṇe ghanopale. Kuṇḍikāyaṃ bhiṅgāre. Padātismiṃ catutthasenaṅge.
anya-e0810n0:2464_0: 1013. Chiddādīni tīṇi abhidhānāni susire ca dūsane aparādhe ca tīsu siyuṃ. Muccite muccitabbe.
anya-e0810n0:2468_0: 1017. Phalamhi rukkhādīnaṃ phalamatte. Taṃ pakkavacanaṃ. Nāsamukhe nāsābhimukhe ca pariṇate ca tīsu.
anya-e0810n0:2469_0: Ājīvane jīvitavuttiyaṃ. Piṇḍane rāsikaraṇe. Goḷake vaṭṭale.
anya-e0810n0:2472_0: 1020. Sabyamhi adakkhiṇe. Cāru manuññaṃ. Sarabye sarena vijjhitabbe phalakādo. Cihane lakkhaṇe.
anya-e0810n0:2474_0: 1022. Atipasatthe pasatthassa jo, ativuḍḍhe vuḍḍhassa. Takke gorasavisese. Hotīti kriyāpadaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2477_0: 1025. Ikke bahulome kāḷamige. Baḷise macchavedhane. Selabhede vaṅkanāmake pabbate.
anya-e0810n0:2482_0: 1032. Doṇiyaṃ kaṭṭhamaye dhaññamānike. Adhiṭṭhitiyaṃ upariṭṭhāne. Ṭhāne ṭhānamatte.
anya-e0810n0:2484_0: 1035. Anākule ākularahite. Siloke anuṭṭhubhādo. Addhe bhāge. Tīsu pajjo pajjasaddo.
anya-e0810n0:2486_0: 1037. Laddhattharakkhaṇe laddhassa dhanādikassa atthassa rakkhaṇe. Niyojane pesane. Kāriye phale.
anya-e0810n0:2488_0: 1039. Laggasmiṃ saṅge. Majjhamhi udare. Bhāge asamaddhabhāge. Dhanimhi mahaddhane.
anya-e0810n0:2489_0: 1040. Gahane saṅkare. Sasantāne attano niyakajjhattasantāne. Visayagocarānaṃ viseso vutto.
anya-e0810n0:2491_0: 1041. Bhuvane kāmabhavādike. Jane pāṇimhi. Yase kittiyaṃ. Pajje anuṭṭhubhādo. Rukkhe rukkhabhede.
anya-e0810n0:2495_0: 1044. Sūraṃsūsu sūriye, kiraṇe ca. Dame damane. Mānaṃ mānaviseso. Sānu pabbatasānu.
anya-e0810n0:2497_0: 1046. Māṇavo macco. Attā sarīrādhipatidevatā. Sire uttamaṅge. Tipumhi kāḷalohe.
anya-e0810n0:2499_5: Phoṭo nāma yasmiṃ pūye viparīte dukkhavedanā natthi.
anya-e0810n0:2500_1: Bhāsapakkhī ca pakkhī ca bhāsapakkhino, tesu,
anya-e0810n0:2501_1: Yo ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā puna otaritvā udakabbhantare macche gaṇhāti,
anya-e0810n0:2502_2: Meso usabho methunaṃ kakkaṭo sīho kaññā tulā vicchiko dhanu makaro kumbho mīnoti mesādi.
anya-e0810n0:2503_4: Najjantareti gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahīti pañcasu mahānadīsu pañcamāya mahānadiyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2505_0: 1054. Mariyādasaddo dvīsu. Sattā vijjamānatā. Samiddhi sampatti. Soppe niddāyaṃ. Vutti jīvitavutti.
anya-e0810n0:2507_0: 1056. Rañjane kāsāyādirañjane. Sūrate methune. Vāse vasanakriyāyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2508_0: 1057. Patthe mānatumbe. Nāḷe uppalādīnaṃ nāḷe. Pipāsāyaṃ pātumicchāyaṃ. Vutti bhavanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2511_0: Nābhi padhāne katthūri-maṃse ca kvaci kittito”ti. –
anya-e0810n0:2515_0: 1061. Vitte dhane. Aṅko lakkhaṇaṃ. Buddhi ñāṇaṃ. Khe ākāse.
anya-e0810n0:2516_4: maṇisaṅkhāto vā ratanaviseso idha maṇi nāma.
anya-e0810n0:2517_0: 1063. Lipi akārādīnaṃ sannivesaviseso. Mokkho nibbānaṃ. Rate sūrate.
anya-e0810n0:2519_0: 1065. Dvāramattepi bahidvārepi. Ito paraṃ ye anekatthā vuccante, te vāccaliṅgā. Phuṭe pākaṭe.
anya-e0810n0:2520_0: 1066. Ajjhakkhe adhikate. Jaḷe aññāṇe. Lolupe atitaṇhe. Cale kampite.
anya-e0810n0:2521_0: 1067. Vikate virūpe. Komalaṃ akaṭhinaṃ. Atikhiṇo kuṇṭho.
anya-e0810n0:2525_0: 1071. Byāpe byāpite. Bhāvini anāgate vatthumhi. There jiṇṇe.
anya-e0810n0:2526_2: dvīsu ca na pavattatī”tyādīsuyeva pavattatīti maññamāno “tyādo”ti vadati.
anya-e0810n0:2526_4: bahuvacana”nti vuttattā pana dvīsupi bahusaddo vattateva.
anya-e0810n0:2526_5: Ācariyena vā parasamayavacanāni manasi katvā “tyādo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2526_6: Tividhañhi tattha vacanaṃ ekavacanaṃ dvivacanaṃ bahuvacananti.
anya-e0810n0:2526_7: Sabbapārisadattā hi byākaraṇassa sabbesaṃ vādā katthaci kathīyante.
anya-e0810n0:2527_1: sā yassa atthi, sa dhīro, budho.
anya-e0810n0:2528_0: 1073. Yāne hatthādiyāne yoggaṃ. Khame pana yoggo.
anya-e0810n0:2529_0: 1074. Vuḍḍhe āyuvuḍḍhe. Kulaje kulīne. Vuddho āyuvuḍḍho. Uru pamāṇato mahanto.
anya-e0810n0:2530_0: 1075. Vutte vattabbe. Uggate uddhaṃgate. Āditte agyādīhi, gabbite sañjātamāne.
anya-e0810n0:2531_0: 1076. Vigate vigatarāge. Vāyane vīte paṭe. Bhajjite dhaññādike. Bhajja pāke.
anya-e0810n0:2533_0: 1078. Arimhi sattumhi diṭṭho. Ikkhitepi diṭṭho. Pote bālake. Vate ekantasādhane vatakamme.
anya-e0810n0:2536_0: 1081. Gopagāme gopālānaṃ gāme. Rave sadde. Sārathi pājitā. Vandī thutipāṭhako.
anya-e0810n0:2539_0: Vopālito. Pupphe suttādinā asaṅkhate. Taddāme pupphadāme suttādinā saṅkhate. Sakaṭe ane. Haye asse.
anya-e0810n0:2540_0: 1082. Accane pūjāyaṃ. Bhe nakkhatte. Nettamajjhe “sūlā”ti khyāte. Odhi mariyādo.
anya-e0810n0:2543_0: 1085. Sikhā cūḷā. Piñchaṃ pucchaṃ. Attani “saṅghikaṃ puggalika”ntyādīsu. Khepe nindāyaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2551_0: 1093. Bhe nakkhattabhede. Dhenuyaṃ siṅginiyaṃ. Yoniyaṃ itthīnaṃ aṅgajāte. Sire sīse.
anya-e0810n0:2552_7: Tejasaddo pana tesu ca yathāvuttesupi dvīsvatthesu,
anya-e0810n0:2555_0: 1097. Rukkhe ambaṭṭharukkhe. Parasamaye pana bādhā. Adhikappeme atisayapeme.
anya-e0810n0:2556_0: 1098. Ketumhi dhaje. Lekhye likhitabbe lekhe. Rājiyaṃ tu lekhā.
anya-e0810n0:2557_0: 1099. Satthe āvudhabhede. Satte pāṇimhi. Caye samūhe.
anya-e0810n0:2559_0: 1101. Saṃsade sabhāye. Ayanasaddo gamane, pathe ca vattati.
anya-e0810n0:2560_9: So ca no pume pulliṅge na vattati.
anya-e0810n0:2562_0: 1104. Chadane gahādīnaṃ chadane. Rāsi puñjo, sahadhammīnaṃ gaṇo ca.
anya-e0810n0:2565_0: Vopālito. Yajane devapūjāyaṃ. Accane pūjāmatte. Dikkha muṇḍiyopanayananiyamabbatādesesu.
anya-e0810n0:2567_0: 1106. Adhare dantāvaraṇe. Kharabhe “ka-la-au”iti khyāte. Lobhapuggalepi luddho. Āvile anacche.
anya-e0810n0:2569_1: Hāso ca gandho ca hāsagandhā, tesu.
anya-e0810n0:2575_0: “Malayo dese selaṅgapabbatantare, malayātivutāyañcā”ti vopālito. Aṅko cihanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2576_0: 1114. Sappimhi ghate, tadaññe hotabbe ca havi.
anya-e0810n0:2577_0: “Rahasi ca vicāre ca, viveko jaladoṇiya”nti vopālito.
anya-e0810n0:2579_0: “Vego jave pavāhe ca, mahākālaphalepi ce”ti medinīkosa 3.24 vopālito. Khile aṇukhāṇumhi. Kaṇe appe.
anya-e0810n0:2582_1: nago cāti dve abhidhānāni selarukkhesu vattanti.
anya-e0810n0:2583_0: 1118. Chidde dose. Otaraṇaṃ jalatitthādīsu avataraṇaṃ. Ayyake pitupitari.
anya-e0810n0:2584_0: 1119. Rukkhe khaggaphale. Sune sunakhe. Gandhe adhivāsanagandhe.
anya-e0810n0:2587_0: 1122. Khajjantare sūkaravaccasaṇṭhāne dhaññavikāre. Dise ripumhi. Pati dhavo. Ariyo adhipati.
anya-e0810n0:2591_0: 1125. Āvāṭe kūpe. Caye samūhe ca. Kāsu sā, kāraṇe, rahasi ca upanisā.
anya-e0810n0:2596_3: galo cāti dve abhidhānāni iṇe siyuṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2599_0: “Madano māradhuttara-vasantadumasitthake”ti vopālito. Pamātari mātumātari. Veṭhe uṇhīse ca veṭhanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2600_0: 1132. Taṇḍuleyye tilaphalasāke. Ayye sāmini. Mutti muccanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2602_0: 1134. Yāge devapūjāyaṃ, sadādāne ca satraṃ. Sasu hiṃsāyaṃ, traṇa, satraṃ. Osadhimhi, cande ca somo.
anya-e0810n0:2607_1: Yugagehaṅgeti pubbāparāyāmavasena thambhānaṃ upari ṭhapite yugabhūte gehāvayave.
anya-e0810n0:2612_1: Balavaṃ suṭṭhu atīva kimuta su ati ete cha atisayatthe.
anya-e0810n0:2612_4: Āho kiṃ kimu udāhu kimuta uda ete cha vikappe vitakke.
anya-e0810n0:2613_1: Bho are ambho hambho re je aṅga āvuso he hare ete dasa avhāne.
anya-e0810n0:2613_3: Kathaṃ kiṃsu nanu kacci nu kiṃ ete cha samā samānatthā.
anya-e0810n0:2614_2: Aññadatthu taggha sasakkaṃ addhā kāmaṃ jātu ve have ete aṭṭha ekaṃse ekaṃsatthe.
anya-e0810n0:2616_1: Yathā tathā yatheva evaṃ yathānāma yathāhi seyyathāpi evamevaṃ vā tatheva yathāpi evampi seyyathāpi nāma
anya-e0810n0:2616_2: yathariva yathā ca viya tathariva iccete sattarasa paṭibhāgatthe sadisatthe bhavanti.
anya-e0810n0:2617_2: Āma sāhu lahu opāyikaṃ patirūpaṃ sādhu evaṃ ete satta sampaṭicchanatthe.
anya-e0810n0:2619_0: 1146. Jātusaddo ekaṃsepi. Sabbato, samantato, parito, samantā cāti cattāro tulyatthā.
anya-e0810n0:2620_1: Na a no mā alaṃ nahi iccete cha nisedhe. Ce, sace,
anya-e0810n0:2622_1: Aho ca hi cāti ete vimhaye.
anya-e0810n0:2623_1: Sudaṃ kho assu yagghe ve hādayo hakārādayo ca padapūraṇe siyuṃ. Antarena, antarā,
anya-e0810n0:2624_3: Kāmappavedane icchāya akkhāne kacci jīvati te mātā,
anya-e0810n0:2630_0: 1155. Sāyaṃ sāye sāyanhe. Atrāheti imasmiṃ ahani ajjasaddo.
anya-e0810n0:2635_0: 1160. Āsiṭṭhatthamhi suvatthi. Dhisaddo nindāyaṃ. Kuhiñcanādayo satta ṭhānādipucchanatthā.
anya-e0810n0:2636_1: Iha idha atra ettha attha ete okāsatthādivācakā.
anya-e0810n0:2637_1: Vibhatyantanāmasarākhyātapatirūpake abyaye dassetvā tadaññabhāve abyaye dassetumāha “ādikamme”iccādi.
anya-e0810n0:2638_12: Ete catthā dhātusaṃyogatthā vā nāmasaṃyogatthā vā bhavanti.
anya-e0810n0:2638_13: Asaṃyogassa pana nāmapadassa attho “po siyā paramatthasmiṃ,
anya-e0810n0:2638_14: pātu vātesu pā bhave”ti ekakkharakose ekakkharakosa 73 gāthā vutto.
anya-e0810n0:2642_0: 1169. Du ca abhāve dussīlo, duppañño. Asamiddhiyaṃ dubbhikkhaṃ. Anandanaṃ amodanaṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2644_3: tena samanta pariyāyopi bhusasaddo atthīti veditabbo.
anya-e0810n0:2645_5: Deso ca byāpanañca hāni cāti dvando.
anya-e0810n0:2648_4: Asacce lakkhaṇādimhi catubbidhe ‘abhirabhāge (pā.1.4.91)’ ti abhissa bhāgavajjitesu lakkhaṇādīsu kammappavacanīyasaññā vuttā (rūpasiddhi-
anya-e0810n0:2649_2: adhiṭṭhāne pāpuṇane nicchaye uparibhāgādike bhaṭane bhattiyaṃ visesane ca adhi.
anya-e0810n0:2651_1: Samīpe ādikammani mariyāde uddhakammani icchāyaṃ bandhane abhividhimhi ca ā.
anya-e0810n0:2651_2: Kicche īsatthe nivattiyañca appasāde āsīsane saraṇe vākyasaraṇe ā evaṃ anussaraṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2659_1: Anvācayo ekaṃ padhānabhāvena vatvā itarassa appadhānabhāvena vacanaṃ, tasmiṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2659_4: Itarītare samaṇo ca brāhmaṇo ca samaṇabrāhmaṇā.
anya-e0810n0:2659_5: Tatra kevalasamuccayo ca anvācayo ca samāse natthi,
anya-e0810n0:2662_5: Atho athasaddā anantarādīsu catūsu atthesu siyuṃ.
anya-e0810n0:2664_4: Vatasaddo ekaṃse dayāyaṃ karuṇāyaṃ hāse pahāse khede parissame ālapane vimhaye acchariye ca siyā.
anya-e0810n0:2665_3: Yāva tāva tūti yāvatāvasaddā sākalye niravasese.
anya-e0810n0:2666_3: aggato samuddhe iccatthe ca paṭhamepi ādimhi vattati.
anya-e0810n0:2667_1: Khalusaddo nisedhe vākyālaṅkāre vākyabhūsāyaṃ avadhāraṇe evatthe,
anya-e0810n0:2669_2: Tusaddo pana tattha catūsu atthesu majjhe hetuvajje tike atthe vattati.
anya-e0810n0:2672_0: Pāvake ca mayūre ca, sukhasīsajalesu ka”nti.
anya-e0810n0:2676_1: Saṅkhyātāsaṅkhyātatthānaṃ upasagganipātasaṅkhyātānaṃ abyayānaṃ pasiddhe pacurappayoge ekacce vā dassetvā
anya-e0810n0:2676_3: Ettha ca tunādisaddehi jjupariyantehi tadantāva gahitā,
anya-e0810n0:2676_4: na hi kevalānaṃ etesaṃ abyayabhāvo sambhavati.
anya-e0810n0:2676_6: tunapaccayanto ca tathā tvāna tave tvā tuṃ dhā so thā kkhattuṃ to tha tra hiñcanaṃ hiṃ haṃ dhi ha yakārato hiṃdha dhunā rahi dāni,
anya-e0810n0:2676_7: kiṃsmā vo dācanaṃ dājjathaṃ thattaṃ jjhajjupaccayanto ca abyayībhāvasamāso ca tunādīnaṃ yādesanto ca abyayaṃ nāma bhaveti.
anya-e0810n0:2676_8: Payogo yathā – “kātuna, katvāna, kātave, katvā, kātuṃ, sabbadhā, sabbaso, sabbathā,
anya-e0810n0:2676_11: kuhiñcanaṃ, kuhiṃ, kuhaṃ, sabbadhi, iha, yahiṃ, idha, adhunā, etarahi, idāni, kva,
anya-e0810n0:2678_0: Vacanesu ca sabbesu, yaṃ na byeti tadabyaya”nti.
anya-e0810n0:2680_0: Iti sakalabyākaraṇamahāvanāsaṅgañāṇacārinā kavikuñjarakesarinā dhīmatā sirimahācaturaṅgabalena mahāmaccena
anya-e0810n0:2682_1: “Saggakaṇḍo cā”tyādinā abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ kapālatelavaṭṭisadisena kaṇḍattayena samaṅgitā dīpitā.
anya-e0810n0:2683_5: bhujagāvasathe nāgaloke cāti etesu tīsu ṭhānesu sannihitānaṃ sakalatthānaṃ sabbesaṃ abhidheyyānaṃ samavhayassa
anya-e0810n0:2683_6: abhidhānassa dīpaniyaṃ pakāsaniyaṃ iha abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ savanadhāraṇādinā kusalo cheko hoti,
anya-e0810n0:2683_7: sa naro mahāmunino sammāsambuddhassa vacane suttābhidhammavinayasaṅkhāte vacane paṭu cheko hoti,
anya-e0810n0:2684_1: Idāni yassa rañño vihāre vasitvā ayaṃ gantho viracito,
anya-e0810n0:2684_2: tassa nāmaguṇanivāsakaraṇappakāravihāraguṇanāmādīni dassetvā attano ca nāmaguṇe dassetuṃ satta gāthā vuttā.
anya-e0810n0:2685_2: yo parakkamabhujo nāma bhūpālo rājā kāresi,
anya-e0810n0:2685_11: So rājā laṅkāyamāsi laṅkānāmake dīpe nivāsanasīlo.
anya-e0810n0:2685_12: Ciraṃ cirakālaṃ vibhinnaṃ tidhā vibhinnaṃ nikāyattayasmiṃ nikāyattayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sammā nayena hetunā samagge samaggaṃ kāresi,
anya-e0810n0:2685_14: tathā sadehaṃva attano kāyaṃ iva niccādaro hutvā dīghakālaṃ mahagghehi ca paccayehi taṃ nikāyattayaṃ rakkhesi.
anya-e0810n0:2686_0: Tathā yena raññā yathā kittiyā attano saddhādikittiyā karaṇabhūtāya laṅkā attano nivāsanaṭṭhānabhūtā kammabhūtā sambādhīkatā saṅkaṭīkatā anokāsīkatā,
anya-e0810n0:2686_1: tathā vihārehi gāmehi ārāmehi khettehi vāpīhi ca laṅkā sambādhīkatā.
anya-e0810n0:2687_0: Tathā yassa rañño sabbakāmadadaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ anuggahaṃ patvā pāpuṇanahetu ahaṃ vibudhagocaraṃ paṇḍitavisayaṃ ganthakārattaṃ patto,
anya-e0810n0:2687_7: vihāre vasatā nivāsaṃ kubbatā santavuttinā santacārinā saddhammaṭṭhitikāmena dhīmatā atisayañāṇayuttena
anya-e0810n0:2687_8: moggallānena sammāsambuddhassa dutiyaaggasāvakabhūtassa āyasmato iddhimato mahāmoggallānassa nāmadheyyena
anya-e0810n0:2694_0: Guṇo ca doso ca sadā vivijjare;
